task.title: Task: Chart Title
task.shortdesc: How to add a title to the top of the chart area.

context.p: When you create a chart, the title appears by default above the chart. You can simply select the text and type the title wou want. You can also hide the title or change its location.

step.cmd: Choose Design Add Chart Element (group Chart Layouts) Chart Title .

step.info: Selecting None removes the chart title.

step.cmd: Double-click the text Chart Title and replace it with your own text for example Sales Bakery.

ul.li: Select the chart title to drag it to another place in the chart area.
To format the title, richt-click it and choose Format Chart Title.

example.title: Faster way
example.p: A little faster way to add or change a chart title:

ol.li: Click the Charts Element button next to the chart and you'll see a list of chart elements.
Check Chart Title and the title is immediately added to the chart. Besides is an arrow and by clicking on it you get the continuation menu.

note.p: The elements with checkmarks are in the chart. You can uncheck them to remove the elements.
